review_data.title: Good quality Asian food in a convenient atmosphere
review_data.content: Generally good quality Asian food in a convenient atmosphere. Wide choice of dishes and drinks, primarily beer and soft drinks, less wines. Mix of Japanese, Thai and Chinese food. Reasonable good service. More suited for a quick dinner rather than an extensive long-lasting meal.
